events.message: I received my order yesterday but the item is not what I expected. I want to return it and get a full refund.
The issue has been categorized as a Refund request based on customer's desire to return the product and receive money back.
Support agent has been assigned to handle the refund request for this case.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I’m here to help you with your refund request. Could you please provide your order number?
To process your refund quickly, please share the order number and a brief reason why you are returning the product.
My order number is 1234567. The product is fine, but I simply changed my mind and no longer want it.
Thank you for the details. You are eligible for a full refund if returned within 14 days. I will send you a prepaid return label shortly.
That sounds great, thank you! I’ll send the product back as soon as I get the label.
We received your returned item and have processed the refund. The amount should reflect on your payment method within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to ensure your refund was received and everything is satisfactory. Please let us know if you need any further help.
Since the refund process is complete and no further issues were reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting support.
